member.name: EMREXTTEXTOUTA
member.summary: The EMREXTTEXTOUTA and EMREXTTEXTOUTW structures contain members for the , , or enhanced metafile records.

member.name: EMREXTTEXTOUTA.emr
member.summary: Base structure for all record types.

member.name: EMREXTTEXTOUTA.iGraphicsMode
member.summary: Current graphics mode. This member can be either the GM_COMPATIBLE or GM_ADVANCED value.

member.name: EMREXTTEXTOUTA.exScale
member.summary: X-scaling factor from page units to .01mm units if the graphics mode is the GM_COMPATIBLE value.

member.name: EMREXTTEXTOUTA.eyScale
member.summary: Y-scaling factor from page units to .01mm units if the graphics mode is the GM_COMPATIBLE value.

member.name: EMREXTTEXTOUTA.emrtext
member.summary: EMRTEXT structure, which is followed by the string and the intercharacter spacing array.
